ModMetaData.name: More Vanilla Turrets
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa, Origional by: Marnador
ModMetaData.description:
Based on the Origional "More Vanilla Turrets" by Marnador. Origional: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=9521.0
A mod that adds more turret variations with the attempt to keep their vanilla art style.
